name: drake moved in
description:
We did it! We've finally got most everything settled in and unpacked. We're especially luck to have gotten $$$$-worth of commercial chrome racks for free (and our garage is our pride of organization now).

The house gets great sun and roasts up nicely in the afternoon to culminate with gorgeous sunsets over the bay and SF. Our commute is our secret path and then a couple public staircases down to the cute Montclair village (to a coach bus to transbay terminal). So far, we're pleased as punch!
